review: Works great, easy to use, just slips right on and right off. I've had it holding a 17" laptop without any issues. I had to flip it over and use the side without the cup holder, then the grips on the bottom worked perfectly and it didn't slide anywhere. This thing is a life saver!
productTitle: Zone Tech Multi-Functional Portable Car Laptop and Food Steering Wheel Tray - Gray Table/Car Vehicle Seat Portable Mount Tray Laptop Notebook Table Eating Desk
